paramInformation.label: Set to Default
paramInformation.description: If value is set to 0XFF (255), device set to default

paramInformation.label: Amount of Decimals
paramInformation.description: If value is set to 1 the info shall be presented with 1 decimal

paramInformation.label: Power Limit
paramInformation.description: The device will shut down when it reaches an amount higher then defined (W)

paramInformation.label: Start Up with Last Known Socket Status
Auto Report %
paramInformation.description: The value will change when the % is changed.

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Watt
paramInformation.description: The value will change when the Watt is changed.

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Time
paramInformation.description: The time between 2 of the meter rerport

paramInformation.label: Relais Delay Time
paramInformation.description: The time that needs to pass before the next state change

paramInformation.label: LED Indicator
paramInformation.description: The state of the Led compared to the relais state
